name: Prodigy Electronics
tag_list: embedded, electronics, pcb, printed-circuit-board, functional-safety, apple, mfi, ios, apps, linux, arm
overview:
Prodigy Electronics, is an Original Design Manufacturer (ODM) of custom high technology embedded electronic components and products.

Founded in 2001 in Hong Kong, Prodigy has in-house design centers located in Hong Kong SAR, China, and Chennai, India, and manufacturing centers located in South China.

BUSINESS UNITS

Prodigy component divisions supports global customer’s in manufacture of customer Printed Circuit Boards (PCB) from its manufacturing centers in China. Prodigy supports Printed Circuit Board requirements from 2 layer to 50 layer, with complex requirements including blind and buried laser via.

Prodigy Original Design Manufacturing (ODM) division, provide customers the convenience of a one-stop shop through a Total Value-Added Package: from product design and development, through component sourcing, production planning and management, quality assurance to export documentation and shipping consolidation.

CUSTOMERS

Customers of Prodigy Electronics include blue chip companies such as Schnieder Electric, Thyssenkrupp Escalators, Microsoft, Octopus and others. Products from Prodigy Electronics are presently used in more than 6000 bus of Hong Kong public transit network.
